author: Good Enough
description:
CECOT is El Salvador’s massive mega prison built to hold up to 40,000 inmates. CECOT has become one of the largest and most controversial prisons in the world. Inside, prisoners face 24/7 surveillance, overcrowded cells, no family visits, and no rehabilitation programs. Human rights groups call it a “black hole for human rights,” while supporters hail it as a symbol of El Salvador’s war on gangs.

#shorts #youtubeshorts #darkhistory #crimedocumentary #shockingfacts
title: The HARSHEST Prison on Earth 😰💀 #didyouknow #prison #animation #unbelievable
